Body:
features = [GraphicFeature(start=10, end=20, strand=+1, label='a'),
    GraphicFeature(start=40, end=55, strand=+1, label='b'), GraphicFeature(
    start=-20, end=2, strand=+1, label='c')]
record = GraphicRecord(sequence_length=50, features=features)
record.split_overflowing_features_circularly()
new_features_locations_and_labels = sorted([(f.start, f.end, f.label) for f in
    record.features])
assert new_features_locations_and_labels == [(0, 2, 'c'), (0, 5, 'b'), (10,
    20, 'a'), (30, 49, 'c'), (40, 49, 'b')]
